org.drooms.api

Interface Game


  • public interface Game
    Represents a certain type of game, with its own rules and constraints.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GameProgressListener play(String id, Properties config, Properties players)
      Initialize the game and play it through.

    • Method Detail

      • play

        GameProgressListener play(String id,
                        Properties config,
                        Properties players)
        Initialize the game and play it through.
        Parameters:
        id - Unique identifier of the game, use any arbitrary string.
        config - Game configuration.
        players - Configuration of players that enter the game.
        Returns:
        A complete account of the game's progress.
